lines.text: Hey, did you teach your students how to make things like this?
Have you been in a high school recently? My students taught ME how to make stuff like this.
What did you hit me with, anyway?
It was a crucifix. (Everyone looks at her) What? It was all I could find.
Great, I'm gonna have people from all around the world come to see the impression of Jesus on my forehead.
You took the money. Didn't you son?
Yeah I hid it in the cemetery.
Why you do that?
I don't like to carry around that much cash, ya know?
Do you want me to get out of here?
Of course, Henry.
Then shut the fuck up!
I'm going to row back there and see if he will shoot you. Or me. It's fine either way.
I wonder whose car this is.
Whoever it is, they like Pat Benatar, Eddie Money and... Oh. The soundtrack to Footloose.
Really?
Oh, my God. This is my car from high school.
I was looking for a place to hide it.
From what? Swamp Thing?
Look! We just want the money! You guys can walk away, we won't kill you!
Watch your step!
For twenty years, I've been eatin' shit; breakfast, lunch, and dinner. So now I'm changing the menu. From here on, everything I eat is gonna be shit-free.

[while floating down the road in a half submerged car]
You all right?
Yeah, I'm fine. I think the heater just kicked in.
At least we're out of the rain, right?
Oh, yeah. This is real cozy.
